text: Imamzadeh Hamzah, Kashmar (), the oldest mosque in Kashmar, includes the tomb of Hamza al-Hamza ibn Musa al-Kadhim, the garden and the public cemetery, and is as an Imamzadeh. == Sources == * Category:Mosques in Iran Category:Mausoleums in Iran Category:Safavid architecture Category:Buildings and structures in Kashmar Category:National Works of Iran Category:Tourist attractions in Razavi Khorasan Province
title: Imamzadeh Hamzeh, Kashmar
